definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]

sentences.english: Inscribed with a dozen or more function scales, the slide rule symbolized the mysteries of arcane science.
sentences.chinese: 计算尺上刻著十几种函数刻度，宛如科学奥秘的化身。

sentences.english: An alternative method is suggested for calculating the fiber length distribution frequencies, For this purpose a special slide …
sentences.chinese: 建议用一特别设计的计算尺来代替计算圆盘。

sentences.english: The slide rule function is used primarily in aviator watches.
sentences.chinese: 该计算尺功能主要用于飞行员手表。

sentences.english: One handy example is the replacement of the slide rule by the pocket calculator .
sentences.chinese: 一个简便的事例是用袖珍计算器代替计算尺。

sentences.english: Examples are given in detail for its practical applications.
sentences.chinese: 同时，以实例具体说明这种专用计算尺的实际应用。

definition: to do a sum in writing/written calculation
